definition: low/beneath/to lower (one's head)/to let droop/to hang down/to incline
flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
fire/urgent/ammunition/fiery or flaming/internal heat (Chinese medicine)/hot (popular)/classifier for military units (old)/Kangxi radical 86
mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
mouth/classifier for things with mouths (people, domestic animals, cannons, wells etc)/classifier for bites or mouthfuls
mafic rock (containing magnesium and iron, so comparatively heavy, making oceanic plates)
Uluru, iconic large rock formation in central Australia, sacred to Aboriginals, a World Heritage Site/also known as Ayers Rock
East Pacific Rise (a mid-oceanic ridge stretching from California to Antarctica)
pinyin: Dong1 Tai4 ping2 Yang2 Hai3 long2

definition: Flores, Indonesia/also written 弗洛勒斯島|弗洛勒斯岛[Fu2 luo4 lei1 si1 dao3]
rhyolite (extrusive igneous rock, chemically equivalent to granite)
